The Steve Howe Trio - New Frontier

Fraser Smith 2019-10-30

Really enjoying the jazzy Yes vibes of this new album from The Steve Howe Trio.

I’ve been a huge Yes fan for around 40 years or so. It’s good to hear shades of Howe’s distinctive guitar sound in this, altogether, more mellow setting.


#music , #jazz , #prog , #true , #Steve Howe

The Steve Howe Trio - New Frontier
